name: antsct-fw
label: ANTs Cortical Thickness
description: Gear version of the antsCorticalThickness.sh pipeline. Performs 1. Brain extraction  2. Brain n-tissue segmentation  3. Cortical thickness  4. (Optional) registration to a template

t1_anatomy.description: T1-weighted anatomical NIfTI file. When provided this file will be used in place of any T1w images found in the current session's BIDS dataset.

denoise.description: Run denoising within the ACT pipeline.

num-threads.description: Maximum number of CPU threads to use. Set to 0 to use as many threads as there are cores

run-quick.description: 'true' to use quick registration, 'false' to use the default registration.

trim-neck.description: 'true' to run the trim_neck.sh script, 'false' to use the raw data.

BIDS-subject.description: The sub- field of the input image filename. Leave blank if the correct file is distinguishable without a sub- field.

BIDS-session.description: The ses- field of the input image filename. Leave blank if the correct file is distinguishable without a ses- field.

BIDS-acq.description: The acq- field of the input image filename. Leave blank if the correct file is distinguishable without an acq- field.

BIDS-run.description: The run- field of the input image filename. Leave blank if there is only one run.

author: Tustison, et al. | Modified for Flywheel by Philip Cook, Will Tackett
cite: Tustison, Nicholas & Avants, Brian & Cook, Philip & Song, Gang & Das, Sandhitsu & van Strien, Niels & Stone, James & Gee, James. (2013). The ANTs cortical thickness processing pipeline. Progress in Biomedical Optics and Imaging - Proceedings of SPIE. 8672. 86720K. 10.1117/12.2007128.
